2+1.sig_info: Nightcrawler’s unique heritage, coupled with his X-Men training allows him to switch combat mode 0.30 seconds faster. Additionally, anytime he strikes an Instant Bleed, he gains 12.45 to 29.05 increased Attack for 7 seconds.

PASSIVE: By Dodging back and holding Block for 2 seconds, Nightcrawler can shift his tactics and switch his Combat Mode.
While in Swashbuckling Mode, Nightcrawler focuses on aggression and quick attack bursts. This grants him periodic Precision Buffs, increasing Critical Rating by 533.33 for 4 seconds.
While Dodging back, Nightcrawler cannot be struck by attacks. Additionally, whenever he successfully dodges an attack this way, he gains +139.13 Critical Damage Rating until his next Critical Hit.
WHEN ATTACKED: While in Neyaphem Mode, Nightcrawler focuses on teleportation and dexterity, granting him a 22% chance to Evade incoming attacks. The chance to Evade attacks is increased by 15% against attacks that would deal Physical Damage.
CRITICAL HITS: Nightcrawler’s cutlass has a 70% chance to inflict an instant Bleed, dealing 43.99 Direct Damage. The chance to inflict an instant Bleed increases by up to 10% based on how low the opponent’s Armor is.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Using this attack increases Nightcrawler’s chance to Evade by 33% for 10 seconds if in Neyaphem Mode.
Using this attack increases Nightcrawler’s Critical Damage Rating by 154.39 for 10 seconds if in Swashbuckling Mode.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack reduces enemy Block Proficiency by 1257.14 while in Neyaphem Mode.
The chance to score an Instant Bleed with this attack is increased by 33% while in Swashbuckling Mode.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack disorients the opponent, granting Nightcrawler a permanent 27% increased chance to score an Instant Bleed.
